properties.name: alt
properties.description: Alternate text for the area, used for accessibility

properties.name: coords
properties.description: Coordinates to define the shape of the area

properties.name: download
properties.description: Specifies that the target will be downloaded when clicked

properties.name: media
properties.description: Specifies what media/device the linked resource is optimized for

properties.name: referrer_policy
properties.description: Specifies which referrer information to send with the link

properties.name: rel
properties.description: Specifies the relationship of the target object to the link object

properties.name: shape
properties.description: Defines the shape of the area (rectangle, circle, polygon)

properties.name: target
properties.description: Specifies where to open the linked document
